Description: An adult and three juveniles were wounded in an evening shooting.
Six shoppers were wounded at a grocery supermarket by two shooters.
During an outdoor New Year's Eve party, a physical fight started escalated to a shooting, with multiple people firing guns.
Six shooters opened fire on a busy street with six wounded.
An adult and infant were killed and two adults wounded in an afternoon shooting.
A man was killed and three others wounded at a local gas station.
A gunman went on a shooting spree across multiple locations in the Denver metropolitan area before dying in a shootout with police.
A man was killed and three others were wounded at a local apartment complex.
Four adults were wounded inside a pop-up store.
Four people were wounded at a rest stop, and the shooter fled before police arrived. The shooter was later found dead.
Three teenagers were killed and a fourth wounded in a convenience store.
Seven people were wounded at a party in the early morning. An 18-year-old was later arrested.
Four people were wounded in a drive by shooting in North Philadelphia.
Four people were wounded near a Waffle House in the early morning.
Four men were wounded outside a Brooklyn deli shortly before midnight.
A woman was arrested after killing one and wounding three in a domestic incident at an apartment.
Six people were found wounded in a local home, with one identified as the potential shooter.
One man was killed and three others were wounded in a shooting across the street from a strip club.
One person was killed and three wounded in Upton.
Four adults were wounded in the early morning at a gentleman's club.
A man was killed and four people wounded in Penn North.
Four people were wounded in an afternoon shooting.
Police were alerted to four wounded by gunfire after an argument escalated through a shotspotter alert.
Four adults were wounded in Kengsington, they were found by patrolling police.
Six people in an SUV were shot at in the early morning, causing the SUV to crash. Two adults were killed and four juveniles wounded.
Six people were wounded at local sports bar in the early morning.
Five people were wounded in the early morning, a suspect was arrested days later.
One person was killed and fourteen others wounded in a drive-by shooting at a memorial vigil in Baytown for another shooting victim.
Three security guards and a bystander were shot by a gunman at a nightclub.
Four adults were shot at a bowling alley at approximately 1 AM, killing a 23-year-old man.
Three teenagers and a baby were shot while in a car near an intersection, killing a 17-year-old girl.
Five people were shot in a drive-by shooting in the Callahan neighborhood.
Five people were shot in the Grier Heights neighborhood.
Responding officers found one person killed and two wounded, with an additional two wounded found at the hospital.
Three men and a teenager were wounded in Brewerytown.
Four men were shot by a gunman, two of whom succumbed to their injuries.

A fight broke out in the parking lot of a bar, after a group was ejected. It escalated, with bystanders attempting to intervene. A man walked up and shot at the bystanders killing one and wounding three.
Two teenagers were killed and a teenager and an infant were wounded in a drive-by shooting at a gas station.
Responding officers found two adults and a child killed and three adults wounded.

Oxford High School shooting: A 15-year-old student opened fire at Oxford High School initially killing three students and wounding seven others and a teacher, before being arrested. One of the wounded died a day later. The suspect was charged with four counts of murder and seven counts of attempted murder while his parents, who bought him the gun used in the shooting as an early Christmas present, were charged with four counts of involuntary manslaughter.

Responding officers to a domestic incident were shot at by the suspect. The suspect had killed two women and wounded a child previously. An officer and the suspect were killed and another officer was wounded.
Responding police found six adults and a teenager wounded in East Baltimore.
A teenager was killed and four others wounded at a gas station.
A man killed his four children and his mother in law in their home. He turned himself in to police an hour later and was charged with five counts of murder.
Five youths were wounded in a shooting.
Four people were wounded in an evening shooting in Kingsessing.
A teenager was killed and three others were wounded after men in a car opened fire in the South Ward.
Home invaders killed two teenagers and wounded their mother, two teenage siblings and an adult sibling. One of the assailants was also killed.
Two men were killed and two others wounded in a believed targeted drive-by shooting. Eyewitnesses are not cooperating with police.
Four people were wounded and transported to the hospital in private vehicles.
Four people were wounded after a large party was ending. Police believe it connected to another incident near a local hospital.
A man was killed and three others wounded shortly before noon. A suspect was arrested.
Two men were killed and two juveniles were wounded while in a vehicle outside an apartment complex.
A man was killed and four others were wounded in the parking lots of a local club.
Four adults and one child were shot during a backyard party.
Two men were killed and two wounded at an apartment complex.
Four people were wounded at a local bar in the early morning.
One teen was killed, and three other teens were wounded in two separate but related shootings on the same block.
A man was killed and three others wounded in an afternoon shooting.
Two adults and two teens were wounded in a potentially targeted drive-by in Williamsbridge.
Four teens were shot during a gunfight near a high school.
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting shortly after midnight on the Near West Side.
Four men were shot outside of a bodega in Harlem.
Six teenagers were wounded in a drive-by shooting at a park located across from a high school.
Three men and three women were shot, one man critically.
Two men opened fire at each other at a lounge, wounding five. One of the shooters was killed by responding police.
Four people were shot, two of the victims fatally.  A man from Klamath Falls was arrested and charged with murder.
Four men arrived at a trailer park and confronted a homeowner and a guest, leading to the homeowner shooting and killing the four men and the guest being injured by the four attackers.
A man was killed and five others wounded at a gas station in the early morning.
Four people were wounded after several people opened fire at a party.
Four people were wounded at a high school homecoming after-party, after multiple attendees began shooting.
Two children were killed and two adults wounded on the East End.
Two wounded were found outside a vehicle, where two were found deceased in the backseat. Several weapons were found in the vehicle.
Four teenagers were wounded in an evening shooting.
Three adults were killed and an adult and child were wounded after an argument escalated inside a home.
A man was killed and three adults and a teenager wounded in an ambush-style shooting outside a grocery store.
Three teenagers and an adult were wounded after three of them exited a local store in Feltonville and were chased down the street.
A man was killed and three others wounded in the early morning.
Two people were killed and two wounded at a family birthday party.
Six people were wounded in the early morning at a large community event.
Shortly after midnight a man opened fire at a local bar, wounding four.
A man was killed and three wounded in a drive-by shooting in East Oakland.
Four people were wounded in an evening shooting a block away from a middle school.
A man killed three women and wounded two in a targeted domestic dispute. One of the wounded was targeted and the others attempted to help her.
A woman shot and wounded four in a bowling alley after a fight escalated.
After an online dispute, a person shot four people in Downtown Orlando.
Four people were wounded in an evening drive-by on the West Side.
Four people were shot just after midnight on Halloween.
Four people were shot, two fatally.
A woman was shot and killed and nine injured at a large Halloween party of hundred people.
Two cousins working as security were shot and killed. Two others were wounded.
An 18-year-old was arrested after killing a man and wounding three others in a drive-by shooting.
Two people were killed and several wounded after two men opened fire on a Halloween party.
One person was killed and three wounded after a shooting at a house party. The party occurred at the home of a Gilroy councilwoman.
A man was killed and several people wounded after a shooting at a Halloween party.
Four people were wounded in a residential area in the early morning.
Four people were wounded at a large house party in the early morning.
A man was killed and four others wounded at an outdoor boxing match at the Skyway Plaza.
Two people were killed and five injured at a Halloween party that was held at a local banquet hall.
Four people were shot at a party inside an event center.
Three people were wounded at a birthday party and two more were wounded as the tour bus transporting some of the wounded was later shot at.
Four people were wounded after an argument in an alley escalated.
A man was killed and three wounded in a suspected robbery shortly before midnight.

Two people, including a security guard, were shot and killed at a mall, and four others were wounded. The shooter was injured by responding officers and died the next day after being taken into custody.
Three teenagers and an adult were wounded after a shooting near an elementary school.
Two people were killed, and two others injured at an off-roading event.
Two people were killed and three injured in a shooting on Jones Street.
Six people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a local bar.
A teenager was killed and one adult and three juveniles wounded at a Halloween party.
A man was killed and seven others wounded at an off-campus party about two blocks from Fort Valley State University.
Five people were wounded outside a Chatham liqueur store when a man opened fire and then fled.
Four people were wounded in the parking lot of a banquet hall that was hosting a Halloween party.
Five adults and two teenagers were wounded in a drive-by shooting.
Three adults were killed and a fourth later died at the hospital in a night time shooting.
A gunman exited a subway station and shot four people in the Flatbush section of Brooklyn.
A woman shot and killed her father, sister and two workers at their home in the afternoon.
A man killed his roommate's teenage daughter and her boyfriend, and wounded his roommate and her 14-year-old son. He later killed himself.
Responding officers found an SUV in a ditch with bullet holes and blood near Winzer Park. Four adults and a juvenile were later identified at local hospitals although none had reached out to police.
A 19-year-old was killed and three teenagers were wounded in the early morning in the Baden neighborhood.
Responding officers found four people wounded and shell casings around a car in the intersection.
Five people were wounded outside a local bar after an unknown number of people opened fire.
A person was killed and seven others wounded at Grambling State University during a homecoming event in the early morning.
Six people were wounded at a one-year anniversary vigil for a man killed in the location. Neighbors refused to cooperate with police due to fear of retaliation.
Gunfire erupted at a party hall wounding eleven and killing one, responding police opened fire on a man holding a gun and wounded him.
Three people were killed and three injured after a man opened fire inside a night club.
Four people were wounded in the parking lot of a club in the early morning. One of the wounded died two days later.
Five people were wounded at a high school football game.
Responding police found five people wounded in Ventura Village. One of the wounded later died at the hospital.
A man was killed and three others wounded after two shooters opened fire on a Naples Park home. The shooters were also wounded.
Three adults were killed in a home and an infant was found wounded.
Three wounded were found by responding officers, a fourth flagged down officers and two others were found at local hospitals.
Two people were killed and three injured in a shooting near a nightclub.
One person was killed and 14 injured in a shootout at a bar.
Four bystanders were wounded at an after hours club  in an early morning targeted shooting.
A man was killed and four others injured in an early morning drive-by outside a Wicker Park nightclub.
A man was killed and four others wounded after a drive-by shooting at a house party in the early morning.
Three 18-year-olds and a 16-year-old were wounded in South Dallas.
Responding officers found one man deceased and six wounded were later found in local hospitals.
Responding officers found one man killed and three wounded.
Two people were killed and three others wounded after a man went on a multi-parish shooting spree. He was later arrested with a self-inflicted gunshot wound and a dog bite.
Four men were wounded in Southeast Baltimore in the afternoon.
Responding police discovered a deceased man and another wounded, with two more identified at local hospitals.
Three adults were killed and another wounded after two men came back thirty minutes after an argument over parking and opened fire.
Two teenagers and two adults were wounded in the early morning after someone opened fire on another car on the Near North Side.
Five people were wounded when a police officer opened fire on an armed suspect who returned fire before he fled the area.
A woman was killed and five people were wounded in East Baltimore.
Four adults were wounded at a music studio shortly before midnight.
A man was killed and three others wounded after four people exited a vehicle and opened fire on them. The victims were doing work in a parking lot behind a church.
Responding police found four injured due to an evening shooting and one later died at the hospital.
A teen shot four people inside a vehicle at an intersection.
Three men and a juvenile were wounded at a local gas station.
A man was killed and four others wounded in an early morning drive by shooting at a Waffle House.
A man was killed and two adults and a teenager were wounded at an early morning hotel party,
A man was killed and two adults and a teenager wounded at an apartment complex.
Five adults were wounded and one killed in Southwest D.C. late at night.
Five adults and a teenager were wounded after an argument at a hotel birthday party celebration escalated.
Five bystanders were wounded when passengers of two separate cars opened fire on one another while driving down a Fulton River District road.
A woman was killed and three others injured in the early morning after a man opened fire on a car in Park Manor.
A man was fatally shot and three others injured in a gunfire incident on Bloomington Avenue in the Phillips neighborhood.
A man was killed and two adults and a teenager wounded in Humboldt Park on the Northwest Side.
A man opened fire outside a club in Inwood in Upper Manhattan wounding four. Responding officers opened fire an wounded him.

Two groups of people began fighting in a bar and others joined in as it spilled into the parking lot. Some fighters got into cars and opened fire while driving away killing three and wounding three others.
Six adults were wounded in East Garfield Park on the West Side in the early morning.
Four people including a teenager were wounded in East Oakland.
Four men were wounded in the early morning.
Responding police found two adults killed and four adults and a child wounded.
Shortly after midnight six people were wounded at a large house party.

Two adults arrived at a home and engaged in an argument with the four adults there over a 10-month old. The dispute escalated and the four adults living at the home were killed and the two suspects kidnapped the child.
A man murdered his parents and sister and wounded another sibling before committing suicide.
Four people were wounded at the Rosa Parks Metro Station in Willowbrook.
Collierville Kroger shooting: A worker at a third-party venue inside the store opened fire in a Kroger, killing one and injuring 14, before taking his own life.
Four men were wounded in the Mantua neighborhood.
Two teenagers were killed and two others injured in a home invasion. Three days earlier a relative of the two deceased had been killed in another home.
A man opened fire and wounded four adults and one child near Alabama Avenue, Southeast.
A man was killed and four others wounded, with the deceased found behind the wheel of a vehicle.
A man was killed and five others injured in a drive-by shooting in the Fern Rock neighborhood.
A man was killed and three others wounded while at a vigil for another homicide victim, when a group of people opened fire from a black SUV.
After an argument escalated someone opened fire shortly after midnight killing one adult and wounding one adult and seven children.

During an argument one of the victims pulled out her gun and pointed it at the ground, after things calmed down she put it away and began to enter a car with her husband, and two children. The man she was arguing with opened fire once they got to the car, wounding her, her husband and two children.
Two adults were killed and three others and a teenager wounded shortly after midnight when a man opened fire.
A man was killed and three others wounded in the early morning while outside a club.
Five people were wounded while sitting on a porch in Austin during the early morning, after two men exited a vehicle and opened fire.

Two people were killed and two injured after someone shot down an alley at a group standing outside, who were attending a party. The shooting occurred on the anniversary of a similar mass shooting in 2020.
A man was killed and three others wounded at a BBQ at Claremont Park in the Bronx, after an argument escalated.
Two people were killed and two wounded at a liquor store in the early morning.
Four people were shot outside a club in the East Flatbush area of Brooklyn after a dispute.
Five family members were injured after a gunman opened fire on their mobile home at night.
Four people were wounded in the early morning at a night club. Two men were later arrested.
Three teenagers and a boy were injured in a shooting.
Six people were wounded after an incident at a liquor store escalated.
Five people were wounded in a shooting at a candlelight vigil near the intersection in Sherman Park. The vigil was held for a 16-year-old who was killed at the same intersection earlier that day.

An SUV with four deceased adults was found in a local cornfield in Wheeler, Wisconsin. It was discovered later that the four victims were shot in Saint Paul following an argument at a bar with the shooter. The perpetrator's father followed his son in a vehicle on the way to Wheeler and then gave his son a ride home after his son abandoned the SUV in the cornfield.
Four people were found wounded from a shooting.
Two women were killed and four others wounded in a drive-by shooting that targeted a family birthday party.
Three people were found wounded on the street by police, and a fourth victim was located after he fled to the hospital. Two of the victims perished at the hospital.
Five teenagers were wounded at a party at a local shopping center.
A man was killed and three others injured in South Side drive-by shooting.
A woman was killed and four adults and a teenager wounded in a West Pullman drive-by while walking as a group.
Responding officers discovered two wounded from an early morning shooting. Two others arrived were identified at the hospital.
Responding officers found four men wounded.

Deputies were called after a man got drunk and fired shots into the air. He then opened fire on the security guard and officers, before driving down the road, getting into a car accident and opening fire on those in the car. He wounded the security guards and three in the vehicle.
Six adults and a child were wounded in a drive-by shooting. The suspects attempted to flee the area but were hit by a MetroLink train.
Responding officers found one child deceased and two adults and another child injured.
Four people were wounded after two men got into an argument after one was seen arguing and pistol whipping a woman.
After getting kicked out of a night club shortly after midnight, a man opened fire killed a man and wounded five women.
Four people were wounded in a local park in the Southbridge neighborhood after a drive-by shooting.
A man opened fire after an argument at a local Black Pride festival, wounding five.
Four men were injured in a shooting outside a rollerskating rink on Eight Mile Road in the west side.
An adult and three teenagers were wounded at a local festival after two people got into an argument and one opened fire.
Four adults were wounded outside a catering hall in the Bronx after an argument escalated.
Four adults were wounded at a family car show after two men opened fire on the crowd in suspected gang violence.
Firefighters discovered a husband and wife and two children deceased when responding to a house fire. Family members believe the family had been dead for days before the fire.
A man fired into a crowd of people that were fighting in the early morning. He wounded seven and turned himself in the next day.

A former Marine sharpshooter shot and killed three adults, an infant, and a dog and wounded a child inside and outside a home, before engaging in a shootout with police. The shooter was eventually injured in the gunfight and then apprehended.
Three adults and a teenager were wounded after an argument outside a Mt. Washington home. The victims went inside, before the suspect fired through the door.
Two people were killed and two injured after an argument inside a strip mall store escalated. Three people were arrested and one went on the run.
Responding officers found four people injured, with one later dying at the hospital.
Six people were found injured in Northwest DC, with three later dying at a hospital.
A teenager was killed and four others injured while attending a block party.
A teenager shot four people on the street in Homewood South.
Five people were injured in a drive-by shooting in Lawndale shortly after midnight.
Four adults were wounded in an early morning shooting during an outdoor party.
A woman was killed and three others injured in an apartment complex close to US Highway 290 in East Austin.
One person was killed and three injured outside a shoe store in a strip mall, after two men exited a car and opened fire.
Four people were wounded after shooters opened fire on them across the street while they were standing outside a deli.
A man killed one person and wounded two others before kidnapping a woman and infant. He later killed the woman and left the baby alive in the stolen vehicle and is still on the run.
A man killed two people and wounded three others in a mobile home park, before being killed by responding police.
Five people were wounded in an early morning drive by shooting on Jefferson Street.
Three adults were wounded and one was killed near Rainbow Boulevard.
An adult and three teenagers were wounded.
Responding officers found two wounded men, a wounded teenager and two other adults were later found at hospitals.
Two groups got into an argument near Belmont Park and a man opened fire, wounding four people.
Four adults were wounded in Douglas Park while attending a large gathering.

After a football game at a high school, a civilian was injured in a drive-by shooting. Police fired back, which district attorney Jack Stollsteimer says likely hit four people, including an eight-year-old girl who was killed.
Two adults and two children were shot, with an adult and child later dying from their injuries.
Four men were found injured in the West Hollywood neighborhood.
Seven people were wounded just after midnight when two people opened fire at one another.
A teenager and three adults were wounded in a drive by shooting in Uptown.
A man was killed and three adults and a teenager were wounded in East Garfield Park, about four hours after a previous mass shooting.
A SIU student was killed and three other people wounded at a party hosted at a private residence.
Five men were wounded at a vigil for a man that had been killed in the same location earlier in the day.
One person was killed and three wounded in an early morning shooting.
Four people were wounded in an East Garfield Park drive-by.
A man was killed and five others wounded while standing in a Calumet Heights parking lot, after two men opened fire from an alley.
One person died and three were injured after a shooting.
Four people were shot in a Bronzeville business.
A drive-by shooting outside a barbershop killed one and wounded four.
A man was killed and three others wounded in an evening shooting.
A teenager was arrested for allegedly shooting four people on a basketball court, killing a man and wounding three teenagers.
Two people, including a 10-year-old girl, were killed, and four wounded after a shooting.
Four men were wounded after a shooting in Playa del Ray.
A man was killed and three injured in a shooting.
Five men were wounded in a drive-by shooting outside a grocery store in Brooklyn.
Five women and three men were wounded outside a housing project in Brooklyn shortly after midnight.
A man was killed and three others injured outside a local bar.
Three people were killed and two injured after a fight escalated in the parking lot of a local sports bar on the East Side, by a man who drew a long gun and shot into the air.
Three men and a woman were wounded standing outside a home shortly after midnight.
Four adults and a teenager were wounded outside a nightclub shortly after midnight.
A man was killed and three adults and a child wounded in a strip mall parking lot in the early morning.
Four men were wounded in Brooklyn shortly after midnight.
Responding officers found four wounded in the early morning.
One person was killed and six teenagers wounded after a fight broke out at a local park shortly after midnight.
A man opened fire on a group playing a dice game outside a local bar. One man was killed and four injured.
Two men, identified as rap-artists connected to the Wu-Tang Clan, were killed and four others wounded, in a potential drive-by shooting.
A woman and teenager were killed and two other individuals wounded in an evening shooting.
Two teenagers were killed and four others injured at a late-night party at a city park.

A woman was killed and five others were injured in a shooting on Irma Street near the Mattapan/Dorchester border. Police arrived at the scene at about 12:30Â a.m. and pronounced the woman dead. On August 24, police charged a 37-year-old man with murder in connection to the shooting.
A security guard and four others were wounded after a man got into an argument with two security guards outside a club on the South Side.
Five people were shot in the early morning on Bourbon Street. This was the second weekend in a row with a mass shooting in the city.
A man was killed and five others wounded after a fight in a night club escalated out of the club and into the parking lot.
Two men were arguing outside a lounge on the South Side, before it escalated. One of the two was killed, and the other along with five bystanders was injured.
Two men were killed and three wounded at an outdoor event space in Brooklyn shortly after midnight.
Three men and a woman were wounded shortly after midnight.
Four men were wounded in a drive-by shooting.
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting in the Neon District.
Four people, two on the side walk and two in a vehicle, were wounded in a drive-by shooting in  West Nashville.
Four adults were wounded a block away from Temple University Hospital.
A woman was killed and three others injured in the early morning in a home. Three men walked to the side of the home and shot repeatedly through the windows and walls.
Two adults and a child were killed and a child wounded in a home. The shooter was arrested in Florida shortly after.
Nine people were wounded in the early morning at a local dance studio.
Five adults were wounded in an early morning shooting near Bourbon Street.
A teenager was killed and two teenagers and an adult were wounded by a teenager in the Central Business District. He was turned in by a family member.
A man was killed and three wounded in an early morning shooting. Five suspects were later arrested.
Five people were wounded in the parking lot of a Popeyes restaurant in the early morning.
Five people were wounded in an early morning shooting outside a local bar, and one died later at the hospital. An argument escalated causing a gunfight between multiple people.
Four adults were wounded in an early morning shooting while at a gathering in Jackson Park on the South Side.
Two people were wounded and two killed at a large public gathering.
Ten people, including seven bystanders, were wounded in a night-time gang shooting outside a laundromat. The incident took place in North Corona, Queens.
Three adults and two children were wounded outside a funeral home. It is believed an argument escalated inside the building prior.
Responding officers found five people wounded in an evening shooting.
A feud between the occupants of two vehicles escalated into gunfire injuring three adults and a child.

After an argument a man shot and killed his parents. He called 911, and stated he wished to turn himself in, but opened fire at responding officers wounding two. He fled the scene in a vehicle that he crashed and was discovered dead due to a self inflicted gunshot wound.
Five people were wounded in an afternoon shooting, with one later dying at the hospital.
Four adults were wounded in a shooting in Southeast DC.

A shooter killed one and injured three after opening fire at a backyard party, after becoming upset, leaving and returning. He was chased down by partygoers who threw bricks at him in defense, and was pronounced dead by responding police.
Seven people were wounded at a candlelit vigil on the West Side for a hit and run victim. The shooter pulled up in a vehicle and opened fire on the crowd.

When responding to a hostage situation at a home in Wasco, officers were fired upon by the shooter. Two officers were shot, and one succumbed to their injuries. Three people inside the house were slain by the shooter. The gunman was also killed during the shootout.
Five men were wounded shortly after midnight while standing in an Austin backyard, after a man entered and opened fire.
Two people were killed and three injured after someone opened fire on a group leaving a nightclub.
Four people were wounded in a parking lot in Short North in an early morning.
Six people were wounded in an early morning shooting after an argument escalated at an after-hours club.
Two people were killed and two injured shortly after midnight after a fight escalated.

Two people were killed and four injured inside a parking garage near a local nightclub. Responding officers attempted to stop multiple vehicles leaving the structure, with some carrying shooting victims.
Two people were killed and two wounded in a drive-by-shooting.
Four people were wounded in a van after individuals in a pickup truck opened fire in the early morning.
One person was killed and five injured outside a local restaurant in a drive-by shooting.
Ten minutes after an earlier shooting, three teenagers (two would later die) and two adults were wounded in North Lawndale.
A man was killed and four others wounded at a condo complex after an argument escalated.
A 15-year-old and a 16-year-old were killed and three other adults were wounded on a street corner. The 16-year-old died the next day.
Shortly before midnight someone opened fire on a party bus passing by a gas station in Old Town. Seven people were wounded in the bus, and one while pumping gas.
Four adults were killed in a robbery after three men broke into their home. The three men were arrested later the next day.
Four men were injured in Homan Square while standing outside at night.
A gunman opened fire at a group of people leaving a bar early in the morning. Six people were wounded.
One person was killed and three wounded in a shooting.
A man was killed and four others wounded in a drive by shooting outside of a convenience store.
Four were wounded in a shooting after an argument.

Two EMTs were injured after a man opened fire on them as they responded to an unrelated medical incident. The man then drove to a nearby structure fire and shot at nearby people, killing a bystander and wounding a firefighter.

Responding officers arrived at a motel where a man was threatening to kill others and responding officers. The man shot and killed two adults and wounded two others before being shot and killed by police.
One person died and three were wounded after a shooting outside a nightclub.
A woman was killed and six others were injured in a shooting in Downtown Portland.
Five teenage girls aged 12 to 19 years old were wounded while standing outside a party in Austin on the West Side.
Shortly before midnight two men were killed and four others injured in Old Sacramento near the old train tracks.
A six-year-old girl was killed and five adults were injured in a shooting in the nation's capital.
Four people were wounded as passengers in a van taking them from a nightclub.
One person was killed and three injured at Conestee Park after an argument escalated.
One man was killed and three others injured in Austin shortly before midnight.
An adult was killed and three adults and a fourteen-year-old injured in an evening shooting.
Officers responding to a ShotSpotter alert discovered four people wounded at the Bromley Heath Projects in Mission Hill.
Officers responding to a 911 call were fired upon by a suspect who barricaded themselves in a home. One officer was killed and three injured.
A man was killed and four others injured after an argument and physical fight between multiple motorcycle clubs escalated.
Five adults were wounded outside a food mart in Gresham after three men jumped out of a car and opened fire.
Five people were wounded in West Garfield Park on the West Side, after a man approached them and opened fire.
A man and teenager were killed and two adults wounded in an evening shooting in the Knollwood neighborhood.
Four men were wounded in an early morning shooting, three of the four were found in a vehicle.
A man was killed and six others wounded at a banquet hall, after a shooter opened fire due to an earlier argument. Attendees fired back and wounded the suspect, who was later arrested.
Four people were wounded in the early morning at a hotel.
Multiple masked shooters wounded four in Queens after exiting a car and opening fire.
Two men were killed and three injured after a gun fight between two cars in the parking lot of a housing complex.
Three men were killed and one injured after a gunman opened fire at a house party.
A man was killed and five others wounded at an activities complex in the early morning.
Six men were wounded after two shooters walked up to them and opened fire shortly before midnight in the North Philadelphia neighborhood of  Hunting Park.
Four people were wounded in Dorchester, neighbors at first believed it was continuing Independence Day celebrations.
A man was killed and a woman and two children were injured at a gas station in a potential incident of domestic violence.
Four men were wounded by five teenagers who opened fire at the same location they had wounded a woman two days prior. The teenagers were later arrested.
Three adults and a three-year-old were injured while standing outside in a large group after someone opened fire.
A drive-by shooting left one person dead and three others injured at an illegal fireworks show.
A shooting in Washington Park left two dead and four injured, including a 12-year-old girl and a 13-year-old boy.
One person was killed and eleven others injured at an Independence Day block party.
An overnight shooting left four injured, two critically.
Two people were killed and three injured in a shooting at a large teen party at a city park.
Four adults were wounded in an evening shooting.
Two juveniles and two others were injured on Sunday night.
A group of people were fired upon in a parking lot, leaving one dead and four injured.
Four people were wounded in a shooting at a rap concert.
Four adults were wounded at a local club, and all refused to talk with law enforcement about the incident.
Eight people were wounded near a local car wash in the early morning.
Two juveniles and three adults were wounded in a shooting.
A shooting at an Independence Day gathering in southeast Dallas left at least four people wounded.
A shooting at a neighborhood block party left three people dead and two injured.
Responding officers found three men killed and one injured at a large party in the early morning.
Four adults were wounded in an early morning shooting.
One person was killed and three injured in a shooting at a sports bar.
Shortly before midnight four men were wounded in a drive-by shooting in Gresham.
A man was killed and four others injured after an afternoon shooting in East Mount Airy.
Three teenagers and a six-year-old were injured in an afternoon shooting. A fifteen-year-old was later arrested in connection with the shooting.
A teenager was killed and four adults, including a pregnant woman were injured at an American Legion after a funeral.
Unknown assailants fired into a residence in Englewood, injuring seven people including a baby girl.
Two people, including the believed shooter, were killed and four injured in a shooting at a local park.
Responding police officers to shots fired, found one man deceased and an adult and two teenagers injured.
Four teenagers were wounded while walking in Little Village on the West Side in the evening.
A car pulled up to another car waiting to turn and opened fire. An adult, ten-month-old, four and fifteen-year olds were all injured.
A group of people were fired upon, leaving one killed and three injured.
Two adults and a six-year-old were killed and a ten-year-old injured in an evening shooting.
A man opened fire into a crowded Walmart parking lot, killing one and injuring three.
A man was killed and three others wounded at a night club in the early morning.
A woman died and ten others were injured after three shooters approached them from an alley and opened fire in Marquette Park.
Five adults and a teenager were wounded in a drive-by shooting while standing outside in South Shore. A woman died later at the hospital
A tenant with a mental disorder killed three and wounded a neighbor in his boarding house.
After an argument escalated at a pool party hosted at an apartment complex, four people were wounded.
A man was killed and three wounded at a pay-per-view event at a nightclub after a fight broke out.
A man was killed and three others wounded after an argument escalated in the morning in West Rogers Park.
An argument escalated at a funeral service after an outside group refused to turn down music in their car. A man was killed and three others injured.
Two children and two adults were shot in an SUV.
Shortly before midnight, two men and two women were injured in a drive-by shooting in Park Manor, in which the shooter drove a moped.
Five people were shot in an early morning drive-by at a graduation party in the Bronx.
Two shooters opened fire at a local American Legion Post, which was hosting a teen party. All five injured were teenagers.
Two adults and two children were wounded at the local JFK Park, after a man opened fire.
Four people were shot while standing outside when two shooters opened fire in South Austin.
Two men were found dead and two more injured by responding police officers.
Four motorcycle club members were wounded in Englewood.
Minnesota Vikings defensive tackle Jaylen Twyman was shot along with three others while visiting his aunt.
Three people were killed and four injured in a shooting outside a convenience store.
A man was killed and three wounded while leaving Shockoe Bottom after someone opened fire on a group of people.
A woman was killed and three others injured shortly after midnight.
A man was killed and four others wounded during an early morning Juneteenth celebration at a local strip mall.
A woman was killed and ten others injured at an annual community Fathers Day celebration. The shooter was shortly arrested.
Celebrators of a Marimba; a Guatemalan music and dance party, were shot by multiple shooters who fled in vehicles
Eight people were wounded in a shootout between two groups after an argument escalated. Each group had rented a party space, and two of the injured were children.
A man was killed and four others were wounded in an early morning shooting at a local brewing companies parking lot.
One man was killed and three others injured while standing on a porch after a bicyclist opened fire.
A man was killed and five others injured at Lake Merritt near the city's Juneteenth celebration.
Four people wounded and one killed in a shooting.
Two people were killed and four injured in a parking lot after an argument escalated between unknown people and partygoers leaving a concert.
Responding officers found two wounded men in an early morning shooting. Shortly after two more were identified at a local hospital.
Shortly before midnight five people were wounded in Dinkytown.
A shooting killed two and wounded another two.
Four men were wounded in a shooting.
Four people were wounded in a shooting.

One person was killed and twelve others injured in eight drive-by shootings in the West Valley area. A male suspect was taken into custody. Of the injuries, three were wounded by gunfire, while nine others sustained indirect injuries, such as shrapnel from broken glass due to a car crash.
Six people were shot, one fatally, in West Baltimore.
Five people were wounded at West Garfield Park.
Four women were killed and three others injured after gunfire erupted in a South Side residence. Another woman died in a hospital.
A shooting at a Mueller Water Products factory killed two and injured two others.
A drive-by shooting on Interstate 95 killed one and injured three.
Two people were killed and two others injured at a city park.
An altercation resulted in a shooting that killed one and injured five others at a racetrack.
One man was killed and three other people were injured after a shooting in a Newburg neighborhood.
Four people were wounded in a drive-by. Two of the victims were children caught in crossfire.
A shooting in Chatham on the South Side left one dead and nine injured.
Three men were killed while three women and another man were injured in the Kinsman neighborhood.
At least 14 people were shot in Downtown Austin in the early morning hours, leaving one dead. A suspect has been arrested while police are still looking for another.
A shooting left five people injured, including a four-year-old girl.
A shooting left one man dead and four others injured.
One person was killed and seven others wounded in a shooting at a housing project.
Two people were killed and two others hurt in a shooting in White Center near West Seattle.
A drive by shooting on the west side left one dead and three injured, including a six-year-old boy.
Four people were wounded in a drive by shooting that was potential gang activity.
Four people were wounded and one killed in an afternoon shooting. The suspect is known to the victims.

Three teenagers were wounded and an adult woman was killed after their cars were boxed in by other vehicles and fired upon. A fourth teenager was injured in a car accident as one of the cars attempted to flee the gunfire.
Four people were shot, and a fifth wounded by bullet fragments in the early morning at a bar. The shooting was believed to be in retaliation of three men being denied entry into the bar.
Six people were wounded in an early morning shooting while standing on a porch.
A man killed his girlfriend, and another man, and injured three teenagers in a Florida home. The man committed suicide upon police arrival.
Three people were killed and six more injured at a graduation party inside of a restaurant/hookah lounge.
Three shooters opened fire on a group of teenagers near Kiener Plaza, injuring four.
Four people were injured by gunfire at a party in a trailer park.
Four people were shot dead at a home in southeast Portland.
Five men were wounded in the Fremont neighborhood in a drive-by shooting.
One person was killed and four more injured in a drive-by shooting.
Two shooters opened fire on a group in Chatham, injuring eight.
Two people were killed and two more injured while exiting a Boston Market earlier in the morning in northeastern Indianapolis.
Eight people were wounded in an evening shooting while standing outside a vacant hotel.
One person was killed and three injured.
A shooter opened fire on officers during a domestic dispute in an apartment, injuring three. The shooter was found dead from a self-inflicted gunshot wound the next day.
Four people were shot and one other was seriously injured after being run over by a car outside a bar.
Police responding to a fight at a local park were then notified of gunfire. Four people were wounded and one of the shooters was arrested after a car chase.
Two people are in custody after six people were injured in an overnight shooting at a wake.
Four men were wounded in a drive-by shooting.
One person was killed and four others, including two teenagers, were injured in a shooting during a block party.
Five people were shot in the Bushwick area of Brooklyn.
Four teens injured in drive-by.
One person was killed and four others were injured at a residence.
2021 Hialeah shooting: Three shooters stepped out of a white SUV, using assault rifles and handguns, and opened fire on a billiards club. Some of the gunmen are still at large.
Two people were killed and two others injured in a drive-by shooting, after leaving a memorial service at a North Side bar.
A man was killed and three other people injured shortly before midnight outside a club.
Shortly before midnight, police responded to a ShotSpotter alert in Wynwood where they found one person killed and six injured.
A drive-by shooting left five people injured.
2021 San Jose shooting: An employee opened fire at a Santa Clara Valley Transportation Authority (VTA) control center in San Jose, California, killing nine others before committing suicide.
Three teenagers and an adult were wounded in an apartment in the Englewood neighborhood on the South Side. One of the teenagers was pronounced dead before being resuscitated by doctors.
Two people were killed and two others were injured in a shooting while playing basketball.
At least four people were killed at an apartment complex.
Four people were wounded at a basketball court near a local marina when someone opened fire.
Four men were wounded outside a home in East Garfield Park after a man opened fire in the afternoon.
A shooting at large gathering left five people injured.
Four people were wounded in an overnight shooting.
Three people were killed and eight injured at a local bar in the early morning.
An overnight shooting at a private party left four people injured.
Four people were injured after a shooting at a sports complex.
A 16-year-old was killed and at least five other teenagers were wounded in a shooting at Bicentennial Park.
The incident happened in the early morning near a downtown nightclub, after two men opened fire on each other during an argument.
A woman was killed and four others wounded shortly after midnight. An argument had escalated in the parking lot and gunfire struck people inside their apartments.
A teenager was killed and fourteen injured after a shooting at an unauthorized concert.
Two people were killed and twelve others injured at a large house party in a targeted attack.
One person was killed and five others were injured. The injured walked themselves to the hospital.
Two people were killed and four injured in a late night shooting.
Four people were wounded after a fight escalated into a shooting.
Seven people were shot on a party bus celebrating a birthday, two fatally. Police have offered a $40,000 reward for information about the suspect(s).
A pregnant bystander was shot and killed when a fight led to gunfire on a public street and four others were wounded.
Four people were shot on Swan Island in an incident that is described by law enforcement as gang-related.
Responding officers to a fight and shooting call found a man dead and three others wounded at a nightclub.
Four people were wounded leaving the Trap Music Museum in an early morning drive-by shooting.
Five people were shot at a party at an apartment complex.
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting at a Waffle House.
A suspect in a double homicide opened fire on a SWAT team attempting to carry out a search warrant. The suspect was killed and four officers wounded.
A man was killed and five injured in a drive-by shooting while standing outside a gas station.
One person was killed and four other were injured in shooting in The South Bronx.
A man died and two women and another man were wounded in an afternoon shooting.
Two people were killed and three wounded at an early morning gathering in the Auburn Gresham neighborhood.
Three men and a woman were wounded in an evening shooting in West Philadelphia.
Four men found in two separate locations were wounded after a man left a vehicle and opened fire in Southeast Washington, DC.
Two women died and two others were injured in an apartment shooting.
Nine people were shot in Washington Park. According to police, the shooting is the largest in terms of injured in Providence's history.
One person died and three were injured after a shooting at an apartment complex.
Four people were injured in a shooting at a housing complex in West Baltimore.
Seven people were injured in a shooting at a package store.
2021 Colorado Springs shooting: Six people were killed when a man opened fire at a birthday party in a trailer park. The shooter (Teodoro Macias) took his own life shortly afterwards.
Shortly after midnight a fight broke out at Hyatt Regency Phoenix in Downtown Phoenix with a man was killed and seven others wounded.
Four people were wounded in the parking lot of a night club during the early morning. Responding officers had to break up multiple fights upon arriving.
Four people were wounded in the early morning while standing outside for a gathering near Lake Merritt.
Shortly after midnight four people were wounded in an alley in the city's Westside.

A man killed three people and injured a fourth near a townhouse before setting it on fire. Responding officers shot and killed him. The man was reportedly being watched by the FBI before the incident.
A fight broke out at a large outdoor party resulting in two men being killed and three others wounded.
Five people were wounded in a drive-by shooting during the evening. Thirty minutes prior another two had been injured in a separate drive-by shooting.
Four people were shot while sitting on a porch in the South Shore neighborhood.
A man died and four others were wounded after a shooting at a house party.
Three men and one woman were injured in an afternoon shooting after a man entered a restaurant and opened fire.
One person died and three others were injured after a shooting in Frankford.
One person was killed, and three others injured at Carroll Park.
Two men and three women were wounded after a drive-by shooting on the West Side.
A shooting at a house party left four people injured.
A shooting left one person dead and three injured at the Brown Sugar Festival.
Five people were shot outside the Clubhouse Lounge.
At a casino on Oneida land, a man shot and killed 2 people, and seriously wounded another, before being shot dead by responding police officers.
A shooting left at least one dead and four more injured at an outdoor gathering.
Two people were killed and four more were injured in a shooting.
A teenage girl and three others were wounded in a shooting.
Two men and two women were shot and injured.
One person died and four other people were injured after a shooting at a southwest Atlanta home in a drive-by shooting.
Five people were injured during a shooting at a Miami home.
Two deputies were killed and three other people including a suspected gunman were found dead after a standoff.
A shooting left at least one person dead and four more injured.
A three-month-old and her mother were killed after being caught in the crossfire between two groups. Three others are recovering after being shot.
Seven people were shot during a vigil for a shooting victim.
A shooting at a Houma nightclub left five people injured.
An overnight shooting left four people injured at an outdoor party.
A drive-by shooting left one person dead and three others injured at Cheatham Park.
A man is dead and three more are injured after a quadruple shooting in the city's historic jazz district.
A shooting that occurred at a local night club left four people injured.
Five people were wounded in a shooting on Bourbon Street.
A man was arrested after two overnight shootings in downtown San Diego left one person dead and four others injured.
Four people were shot, two fatally, at a housing complex.
Five people were shot, two fatally, in Independence Heights.
Five people were wounded, one critically, at an apartment complex in southwest Atlanta.
A shooting over the weekend left four people injured, including juveniles, and one woman dead.
Five victims have shown up at a Shreveport hospital in connection with a shooting on Hearne Avenue.

Police were investigating a shooting that wounded five, as well as a fatal car crash nearby, when a man drove through the crime scene and later fired at officers. Officers then fired back, killing the man. It is not known if this man was connected to the earlier shooting.
Three people were killed and two injured after a shooting at a tavern.
Nine people were shot and injured during a 12-year old's birthday party.
A woman was killed and five were wounded after a shooting at a vigil for a homicide victim.
Four people were shot at a vigil on the East Side.

Indianapolis FedEx shooting: A shooting occurred outside a FedEx facility near Indianapolis International Airport. Nine people were reported dead, including the shooter, who committed suicide. The shooter has been identified as 19-year old Brandon Scott Hole, a former employee of the FedEx facility.
Three men and a teenage girl were wounded in Northeast DC.
Five people were shot outside an apartment complex. Police say there were four shooters.
Four people were wounded in Humboldt Park.
Four men were shot by at least two people while playing a dice game in East Baltimore.
Four people were shot, one fatally, on the I-290. In addition, a fifth person was hit by a car.
A three-year-old girl was shot and killed; a two-year-old girl and two adult males were shot and injured in the Cumberland View apartments of the North Nashville neighborhood.
During a vehicle pursuit, three police officers were shot and one of the occupants of the suspect vehicle was killed by police.
One man was killed and three others wounded at an Airbnb.
Five people were shot in a parking lot.
A man shot several people at a convenience store. Police say the man knew one of the victims, but the motive is unclear.
Five people were shot at an auto repair shop.
Four people were wounded in a shooting.
A shooting at an Allendale apartment complex near Grand Valley State University injured four people, leaving one critically injured.

Six people were shot, one fatally, during a shootout between two vehicles. Police say the shooting may have been gang related. One of the wounded was in a non-related vehicle, and another was in his home.

A shooting at a cabinet manufacturing store left one person dead, four in critical condition, and one in stable condition. One of the injured is a Texas State Trooper. The suspected shooter is now in custody.
Four people were shot at a Northside gas station, two of them fatally.

2021 Rock Hill shooting: Six people, including two children, were killed in a mass shooting at a Rock Hill home. The perpetrator, a former professional NFL player was found dead by suicide in a nearby home.
Four people were shot in the Cornerstone Village neighborhood.
A man killed the mother of his child and two of her daughters, then later killed himself at the New York City Housing Authority's Van Dyke Houses Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn.
Seven people were injured in a shooting in West Englewood.
Five men were injured in a shooting.
Two brothers are suspected to have made a suicide pact before they shot and killed four family members and then fatally shot themselves in a suburban home.
Two men were arrested for a shooting at a bar that wounded six people.
A woman was killed at a park, and six others, including a 5-year-old boy, were wounded.
Four people were wounded in a drive-by shooting.
Two people were arrested after a shooting injured five people.
Seven were wounded after a nightclub shooting.
Seven people were shot, three fatally, during a house party.
2021 Orange, California office shooting: Six people were shot. Four people, including a child, were killed and two hospitalized.
Five people were shot in the Congress Heights neighborhood. Two of the victims were killed and three others were injured.
Several people were wounded in the Acres Homes area in separate shootings. Houston Police believe the shootings may be connected.
A man killed his parents and two others before setting himself on fire. A fifth person was wounded by gunfire but survived.
Four people were struck by gunfire on a vehicle on Interstate 57.
Four people were injured, two critically, after a shooting at an apartment complex.
Seven people were injured after a shootout at a motorcycle club.
Four people were shot, one fatally, on a party bus.
Four people were wounded after a shooting in the Austin neighborhood.
Several people were injured after a shooting at a nightclub.
In an early morning shooting in Northern Memphis, three people were killed and two people were injured. Of the injured, a man is in critical condition and a woman is in stable condition.
Seven people were shot outside a sports bar in Fishtown. Three of the victims are in critical condition, and four are in stable condition.

Eight people were injured after a fight led to a shooting. Two other shootings, one of which was officer-involved, also occurred that night, though it is unknown if they were related to the original shooting.
One person died and seven others were injured at a party in the Southwest Side of Chicago.
Four people including a child were injured at the entrance of the Cumberland Mall, although the mall was not evacuated. A similar shooting took place in December 2019.
Four people, including two high school students, were shot. One of the high school students later died.
Four people were shot in a vehicle, one fatally.
Four people were shot at a restaurant, two fatally.
2021 Boulder shooting: Ten people were killed including a Boulder police officer, in a shooting at a grocery store. The shooter was shot in the leg by responding police.
Five people were shot at a nightclub.
One person died and seven others were wounded after a shooting at a nightclub.
Five people were shot, one fatally, at a party in the Nicetown neighborhood.
Four people were hospitalized after a shooting at a motel.
Four people were shot in the 7th Ward.
Five people were wounded after a drive-by shooting at a vigil. Police say the victims are uncooperative.
Four people died after a shooting at a home. One man was injured and is expected to survive.

2021 Atlanta spa shootings: A series of mass shootings occurred at massage parlors. Eight people were killed in the incidents and one person was wounded, six victims were women of Asian descent. The suspect was arrested in Crisp County and told police he planned to continue his massacre in Florida.
One person died and four were injured after an overnight shooting in the Northside.
Four people were shot outside a banquet hall.
Four people were injured during a robbery in the South Side.
Two people were killed and 13 injured at an early morning party in South Side.
Five people were shot at a hookah parlor in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
Two people were killed and four injured at a parking lot.
Police found a woman who had been shot and learned there may be other victims at a different home. Police arrived at the home and found four dead, including a child.
One person was killed and three injured at an early morning party.
Four people, including a minor, were injured in a shooting.
Following an argument, a man shot at a car of people, killing one and wounding three.
One person was killed and four injured outside a motorcycle business.
Four people were shot in Overbrook, two fatally. One of the deceased was 16-years-old.
Four people were shot in Kensington.
Three people were killed and one was injured in Southwest Houston. Two of the victims were 18-years-old.
One man died and three people were injured in a shooting. Police believe the shooting was targeted.
Three adults and a two-year-old child were injured at a child's birthday party, in a local apartment building. The shooter was arrested the next day.
Two were killed and three injured after a drive-by shooting at a backyard gathering.
One man was killed and four people were injured in an early-morning shooting.
A shooting at a restaurant killed a man from Pennsylvania and injured four others. Police say the shooting was gang-related.
Several people were injured in a shooting at a convenience store in the Southwest section of the district.
One person died and three were injured after a shooting at a tavern.
Four people were injured at a parking lot in Northwest Houston. Police say the incident was a case of road rage.
A man shot and killed his wife and two others, wounding a fourth. He was later shot and injured by police in Detroit and was taken to a nearby hospital and died days later.
Four people were shot at a gas station. One of the wounded was a 7-year-old girl.
Four people were shot at an apartment complex. The shooting occurred at one of the wounded's apartments.
Five people were wounded in a drive-by shooting. Four were outside, and one was in a store.
Four people were wounded in an IHOP parking lot during the early morning.
Four people were injured after a shooting in South Columbus.
A conflict between two men led to a shooting at a birthday party, killing two and injuring three.
Four were shot, one fatally, after a drive-by shooting outside a market.
Six men were injured at a local car wash, with one man found by police and five others identified at a local hospital.
Four people were shot and injured on Paige Street.
Four people were wounded after a shooting at a mobile home park.
One man died and four people were injured after an overnight shooting at a club.
One man died and three people were injured after a shooting at a bowling alley.
One man died and four people were injured after an overnight shooting in Springfield.

A man shot and killed two people at a gun store. Several people then engaged the original shooter both inside and outside the store, causing injuries to two more people. It is still unclear whether the original shooter was shot dead by engaging responders or committed suicide.
Four people were shot, one fatally, at a party. Most of the people at the party were of college-age.
A man was killed and three others injured inside a barbershop.
A shooter injured eight people, including a seventeen-year-old, near the Olney Transportation Center.

A man suspected in a homicide shot several family members at a house where his grandmother and great-grandmother lived, killing them and his uncle. A woman with gunshot wounds was able to escape to a neighbor's house for help.
A shooting in Bayview injured six people.
One adult and three juveniles were discovered wounded by gunfire in a vehicle stopped at an intersection.
One person died and three others were wounded in an early morning shooting.
Six wounded men were found after a Shot Spotter alert in the Old Oakland Historic District. The victims are uncooperative with officers.
Five people were shot, one fatally in an evening shooting near the Signature Event Center.
Four people were injured during a shootout between two vehicles. Two of the injured were minors.
Four men were shot and injured in a drive-by shooting at Acres Homes.

2021 Buffalo clinic attack: A nurse was killed and four other people were shot and seriously wounded inside of a health care clinic. The perpetrator had made previous threats to commit a mass shooting at the clinic.
Three adults and a juvenile were shot and injured in an evening shooting.
Three teens and one adult were shot at a house party.
A shooting at an illegal club killed one and injured three.
One man was killed in a shooting at a party while two others were hospitalized. Another two were grazed by bullets but refused treatment.
A shooting at a hotel killed one man and wounded five others.
A shooting at a club left three people dead and one injured.
Two were killed in a shooting at a restaurant, while two others were injured. One of the shooters engaged in a gunfight with the police.
Four men were shot at a hookah lounge, one fatally.
During a hostage situation, a man killed a woman and shot three officers. The man was later killed by police.
A shooter attacked four people at an apartment complex near Fort Carson, killing three.

Police discovered a wounded man, who told them he had been shot by another man. The shooter was discovered shortly afterward in a home where he killed one and injured two before being killed by a resident of the home.
One person died in North Memphis and three others were injured in a shooting.

2021 Muskogee shooting: Five children and one adult were shot and killed, and one other adult suffered life-threatening injuries, after a home shooting. The slain adult was the adult brother of the perpetrator.

2021 Sunrise, Florida shootout: Two FBI agents were shot and killed and three others wounded attempting to serve a warrant. The suspect barricaded himself in his home and opened fire before shooting and killing himself.
A man was killed and a woman and two men injured in the early morning.
A woman was shot and killed, and four other people were injured after a shooting.
Two people were killed and three others injured after a shooting outside a club.
A woman was killed and four others, including a baby boy, were injured in a drive-by shooting.
Four men were wounded in the early morning at an illegal gambling den.
A shooting at a market killed a Virginia Union University student and wounded four others in the Southeast section of the nation's capital.
Five people were hospitalized in a shooting, two in critical condition.
Six people including a pregnant woman were killed and a teen was injured in a shooting at a house on the northeast side of Indianapolis. The teen suspect (Raymond Childs III) is currently in custody.
Five people were injured in a shooting at a bar. A suspect was arrested.
One person died during a shoot-out in East Oakland, while three others were injured. The man who died was hit by a stray bullet.
Four people were injured in a shooting just outside Crowley city limits.
Four people were wounded in a string of connected shootings at three different locations.
Five men were injured during a shooting near a strip mall. Police think there may have been a shootout.
A shooting at a nightclub killed one and injured six.
Four men and a woman were injured in an early morning shooting after an attendee at a house party opened fire.
Five people were wounded after a shooting in the Tenderloin district.
Four teenagers were injured in a shooting in the Logan neighborhood of North Philadelphia.
Four teenagers were shot outside an apartment complex in Brownsville in the third mass shooting in Metropolitan Miami in eight days.
A shooting at a nightclub left one person, a teenager, dead, and three others injured.
A shooting that started in Chicago ended in Evanston left five people dead and two injured before the shooter was shot and killed by police.
Three men and two boys were wounded in an evening shooting in Columbia Heights.
A man opened fire on his family killing one man and injuring two women and a teenage boy before fleeing. He was discovered later by officers after dying in a car accident.
Three men attempted to break into a home, and engaged in a gunfight with an occupant. The occupant was killed and two adults and a three-year-old girl were injured.
A shootout injured five people near a convenience store in the Palm River-Clair Mel area.
Seven people were injured in a shooting.
Three men and a fifteen-year-old boy were involved in a shoot-out in the 7th ward, and subsequently wounded by gunfire.
Four people were wounded outside a nightclub in the evening.
Six adults and two teenagers were wounded at a basketball court in Little River Park in Northwest Miami-Dade, when two people walked up and opened fire.
Four people were wounded at a private party.

A fight broke out, outside a Midtown Houston nightclub and a man opened fire. Three officers working a second job as security were wounded, along with the shooter, and a woman, who was the mother of the shooter, was killed.
Two people were killed and two injured after another approached the group on foot and opened fire in the city's lower Eastside.
Two groups of men opened fire at one another in the early morning. Two were killed and three wounded in the shooting.
Four people were wounded in an early morning shooting while at home. Police believe the shooting was targeted.
A woman was killed and four others injured after a shooting occurred at a house party. Multiple guns fired into the house, and attendees fled and drove themselves to different hospitals.
A man was killed and three others injured in an early morning shooting at a shopping center.
Seven people were wounded in an early morning shooting at an event center hosting a New Year's party after two men in a disagreement shot at each other.
